name: Penguins (LtCoyote)
description:
SAVE AS MANY PENGUINS AS YOU CAN!

But you don't have to save all of them...

You start with 99 penguins. Press the START button on the screen to start the penguin o' matic(s) to drop penguins.

Use the commands on the GUI to manoveur the penguins - as they aren't clever - to do things by themselves. Lead them to the iglo(s) to finish a level and score up. (See more info in the How To Play, inside the game)

The game is over when you don't have as many penguins as penguin o' matics at the start of the level.

CREDITS:

Additional level design, testing:

MUSIC:
